name: Counter Fight 4
description:
This Counter Fight is about cafes!


"Counter Fight 4" is a work simulation game where players become coffee shop owners and offer coffee, latte, and sandwiches to unique customers who appear one after another.

While maintaining the fun of the previous counterfight, new fun elements have been added.

The goal of the player is to brew coffee, cook meals, and achieve higher scores as per the customer's order.
After play, your score will be reflected in the rankings of players around the world.
Make coffee and sandwiches quickly and accurately, beat the obstacles and become the best cafe in the world.

New features:
  • The shop is full !? You should take out!
    In addition to the four counter seats, a new takeout window has been added in this work.
    As customers increase, faster and more accurate work is required.

  • Angel supports shopkeeper
    It's full of customers! But please be assured.
    If you meet the requirements, an angel will help you brew coffee.

  • Enhanced energy drinks!
    When you drink, your arms will be mechanized and will be able to stretch with the push of a button.
    Even if you want to serve coffee to a distant seat, you can reach it with just one hand.
